short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your home page experience. Enjoy a clean design, intuitive interface, and enhanced productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your new tab experience with VelVet! Enjoy a clean design, an intuitive interface, and enhanced productivity right from your home page. VelVet transforms your new tab into a stylish and functional hub.

Key Features:

    Dynamic Backgrounds: VelVet fetches stunning nature images based on your screen size, creating a visually appealing background for your new tab.
    Google Search Integration: Effortlessly search Google with a sleek search bar directly on your new tab page.
    Notes Section: Keep your thoughts organized with a handy notes section, complete with checkboxes, edit, and delete functionalities.
    Customization: Experience a clean and elegant design with customizable notes and a draggable interface.
